channel.title: PI autocast help,317

item.title: PI autocast help,317
item.dc:creator: @Ineverbow Ineverbow
item.description:
@Ineverbow wrote:

[code] case 1097:
if (c.autocastId > 0) {
c.getPA().resetAutocast();
} else {
if (c.playerMagicBook == 1) {
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4170 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15001) {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12050);
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1689);
else
c.sendMessage(“You can’t autocast ancients without an ancient staff.”);
} else if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4170 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15001) {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12050);
} else {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1829);
}
}

			}		
		break;[/code]

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4170 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15001) {

this is wrong i think,well im pretty sure it its
some fix it,thanks

// changed the && into ||

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:396: 'else' without 'if' else ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:409: orphaned case case 9157://barrows tele to tunnels ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1514: reached end of file while parsing } ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .
